description: Track-only. Not street legal. Not even close. The Zonda R is a 740-horsepower AMG V12 wrapped in a carbon fiber body that weighs less than a Miata. Every surface is handcrafted. Every bolt is titanium. Pagani built 15 of these, and each one is a sculpture.
lore: Track-only. Not street legal. Not even close. Pagani built 15 of these. Zero has three.
